title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 238: Featuring Mike Sgroi
description:
On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by former enforcer Mike Sgroi. Mike joins (52:14) to tell some funny stories about his career, playing with Whit, what he is up to now and a bunch more. The boys are also in St. Louis for the NHL All-Star game, so they discuss their plan for the weekend and also touch on some NHL news including Patrick Kane's 1000 point, Coach Q's return to Chicago, Auston Mathews dropping out of the ASG and tons more. The guys wrap up with a little wager on the all-star game along with a Gambling Corner (01:40:18) from Rear Admiral.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
